exception.name: Qt LGPL exception 1.1
exception.notes: Used with LGPL-2.1-only, which is mentioned explicitly in the exception text.

titleText.p: The Qt Company Qt LGPL Exception version 1.1

text.p: As an additional permission to the GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1, the object code form of a "work that uses the Library" may incorporate material from a header file that is part of the Library. You may distribute such object code under terms of your choice, provided that:

list.item: (i) the header files of the Library have not been modified; and
(ii) the incorporated material is limited to numerical parameters, data structure layouts, accessors, macros, inline functions and templates; and
(iii) you comply with the terms of Section 6 of the GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1.

text.p: Moreover, you may apply this exception to a modified version of the Library, provided that such modification does not involve copying material from the Library into the modified Library's header files unless such material is limited to

list.item: (iv) small macros, templates and inline functions of five lines or less in length.

text.p: Furthermore, you are not required to apply this additional permission to a modified version of the Library.
